view.title: Owner validates financial/reporting outputs
view.subtitle: Revenue sanity computed from booking orders.

blocks.title: Owner Revenue Sanity completed
blocks.message: Revenue sanity computed from booking orders.

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

resultPayload.note: Revenue sanity computed from booking orders.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

requestBody.title: Customer one signs up and logs in Snapshot

view.title: Customer one signs up and logs in
view.subtitle: Primary customer account created.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Walk-in support (queue management)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.
